item.title: TextMate and Community Server 2008.5
item.description: This is my first blog post from TextMate on my Mac. I’m using the HTML formatting. I will try the markdown and textile versions later. The key to getting this working with Community Server was when you click “Bundles->Blogging->Setup Blogs” and the following template shows up: # List of Blogs # # Enter a blog name followed by the endpoint URL # # Blog Name URL you put the following underneath the commented header
